update credit_sales_history set CARD_NO = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOTHER_CARD_NO = #{motherCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOTHER_TYPE = #{motherType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RELEASE_STORE = #{releaseStore,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CONSUME_TIME = #{consumeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STORE = #{store,jdbcType=BIGINT}, BILL = #{bill,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREDIT_BILL = #{creditBill,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLEAR_BILL = #{clearBill,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREDIT = #{credit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_ID = #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
